name: RPG Stories
description:
RPG Stories is an online 3D World Builder and a Virtual Tabletop that provides you with all necessary, easy-to-use Tools, 3D assets, animated heroes, and monsters for Fantasy, Modern, and Sci-fi TTRPGs, to create your quests and 3D environments.
By summer 2023, you will be able to connect with your friends and play your TTRPG sessions online! Everything you need in all-in-one software!

Important Note: All updates and the final version features are included in the current price.



We know you are tired of spending hours preparing your TTRPG sessions. That's why RPG Stories comes with a lot of Auto-Building features and pre-made maps!

Early Access Status: 3000+Models, 70+ Monsters and Animals, Autoroom-Builder, Mass-Placement Objects, Structures, Object Grouping, 2D Export- Screenshot Tool, RPGs File Export (.rpgs), Various Grounds, VFX Placement, Weather System, Filters & Color Grading/LUTs, Control Sun and Shadows, Fog Of War, Full Manual Worldbuilding, Tab System, Demo environments, Many 2D tokens, 2D Maps by Natwuns.
Final Version: 10k+ Models, Ground Sculpting, Auto-Building, Upper Floors, Μany More Demos and Quests.





RPG Stories supports all Eras of RPGs and it will allow you to play your favorite TTRPGs online with your friends by this summer of 2023!

Early Access Status: No Multiplayer VTT is included yet. Current single-player features: Dice Roller, Map Pinpoints, Drawing Pen Tool, Measurement Tool.
Final Version: Multiplayer Virtual Tabletop for all Eras of TT RPGs, Character Creation & Customization, Character Sheets, Card System, Automation/Rulesets: Agnostic & Customizable



No more 3rd party text pads. We provide you with journals, a note system, handouts, and everything you need to compose your quests within RPG Stories.

Early Access Status: GM’s Journal for Quest writing, Journal per Tab, Quest Notes System in the 3D scene, RPGs File Export (.rpgs).
Final Version: Player’s Journal and Notes, Connect your environments to the journal, Word Tools, and Handouts.



When asked if we have Fog of War, we answer that this won't be enough. RPG Stories will have all the well-known VTT Features like Fog of War, Dynamic Lights, Weather System, Light Sources, 3D Dice, Environmental Lighting, and...well the list is vast!

Early Access Status: Fog of War, Dice Roller, Camera System, Grid, 3D Models for Monsters.
Final Version: Upgraded Fog of War, Upgraded Dice Roller, Advanced Camera System, Player’s Camera System, Dynamic Lights, Field of View, Battle Spell VFX, Hero-Forge API Support.




Our dream is to deliver a 3D VTT where you will be able to customize everything. Feel free to change the textures, upload your models, upload 2D images, upload SFX or music...

Early Access Status: Customize 3D Objects size & shape, Customize Camera Filters, Object grouping.
Final Version: Import 2D Images & 2D Tokens, Save-Export & Share scenes or grouped objects, Customize Character, Customizable Character Sheets, Homebrew Rulesets, Upload your models, Steam-workshop.



We want RPG Stories to become the Community's VTT and that is why we made the following decisions:

1. The GM version includes All the features, world-building tools, VTT/multiplayer, and the ability to create their TTRPG Characters. This is perfect for Game Masters and people who want to get creative!
The Player version is a stripped-down version that does Not include the World-building tools. This version will be available by summer when the big update with the multiplayer will come! Perfect for more casual players!
2. All our exports will always be Commercial-Free.

Early Access Status: The GM Version (Only the Worldbuilder), Commercial Free License to use 2D images wherever you want & RPGs file exports (.rpgs).
Final Version: GM Version (Worldbuilder & VTT/multiplayer), Player Version, Commercial Free License to all exports (2D exports for other VTTs).
